member.name: T:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.ApiKey
member.summary: This class acts as a container for the Skyscanner API key to be used by .NET core's dependency injection framework.

member.name: M:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.ApiKey.#ctor(System.String)

member.summary: This class acts as a container for the Skyscanner API URL to be used by .NET core's dependency injection framework.
